author: cbs8
title: USA Today Music Critic Highlights Rebel J. Rose's Bad Girl ft Pusha T. as One of His Intriguing Discoveries
text:
Team Trilogy MusicGroup
HAMPTON, Va. , Oct. 14, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- It's been said that he has the soulful sound of Lenny Kravitz , the passionate screams of Prince and the creativity of Jimi Hendrix . Rising star Rebel J. Rose has created a new fusion for the future.
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151014/276738
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151014/276739
New York's Floss Magazine says Rebel J. Rose is reinventing the alliance between rock and soul; University Chronicles headlines Rebel J. Rose as a new star in the making; and, before his death, USA Today music critic Steve Jones highlighted the artist in his Intriguing Discoveries segment. Storming in with his highly energized song Bad Girl featuring Pusha T., Rebel Rose demonstrates why his sound is worthy of prestige reviews.
Born and raised in Virginia , surrounded by stars such as Pharrell, Chris Brown , Trey Songz, Missy Elliott , D'Angelo and many others, Rebel Rose has carved out his own unique niche in this homeland of musical Titans. Virginia has proven to be a melting pot of talent and many believe that Rebel J. Rose is next in line for stardom. Seeing is believing! Check out his new music video Bad Girl featuring Pusha T. on http://vevo.ly/BrQQot Vevo .com. You can also download Bad Girl ft Pusha T. for Free at https://www.reverbnation.com/rebeljrose/song/24501174-bad-girl . Discover even more music and footage by Rebel J. Rose on www.rebelroseland.com
Team Trilogy MusicGroup
Management: Mario Daughtry , 757-513-0400
